newsitem.title: CHILE: Chile sends help for Peru mudslide victims.
newsitem.headline: Chile sends help for Peru mudslide victims.

text.p: Chile on Thursday sent a planeload of aid for the victims of the mudslide that burried two villages in the Peruvian Andes.
So far 41 bodies have been recovered, while 250 to 300 people are reported missing after a mountainside collapsed under torrential rains before dawn on Tuesday.

A Chilean Air Force Hercules C-130 plane left Santiago for south-eastern Peru with 50 tents, 400 matresses, 800 blankets, 10,000 disposable diapers, water tanks and clothing, said a statement from the National Emergency Office.
